duties_responsibilities.duty: Independently lead, design, manage, and execute improvement initiatives through all project phases.
Oversee supervision of staff, interview perspective employees, and evaluate staff performance.
Assist in operationalizing collaboration of all Pathology areas within NYU Langone Health.
Assure effective communication within the department, lab leadership, management, staff, pathologists, physicians, and external departments and customers.
Develop project plan and timeline for improvement projects, effectively track deliverables and delegate tasks.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in related field required. Certification in Project Management and/or 7+ years experience. Excellent computer, Microsoft Office, and project presentation skills. Master's Degree preferred. Lean Six Sigma certification preferred.
